inclusion.criterion: Diagnosis of NAFLD and BMI ≥ 30 or obesity with BMI > 35 and < 400lbs
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: No other cause of liver disease other than NAFLD (as assessed by patient and physician surveys detailed below, blood work and magnetic resonance imaging(MRI))
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients with sickle cell anemia, hemoglobinopathies and other hemolytic anemias
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Known clinical hypersensitivity or a history of asthma or allergic respiratory disorders
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Advanced renal failure (currently requiring dialysis or with a Glomerular Filtration rate < 30cc/min)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: History of CPAP treatment for OSA
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has COPD, OSA and obesity hypoventilation syndrome. Daughter reports increased agitation and altered mental status x 2-3 days with O2 sats 60s-70s at home.
